<onlyinclude>** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:bucket_entity_data}}: NBT applied to an [[entity]] when placed from this bucket. Only tags below are applied.
*** {{nbt|boolean|NoAI}}: Turns into {{cd|NoAI}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|boolean|Silent}}: Turns into {{cd|Silent}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|boolean|NoGravity}}: Turns into {{cd|NoGravity}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|boolean|Glowing}}: Turns into {{cd|Glowing}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|boolean|Invulnerable}}: Turns into {{cd|Invulnerable}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|float|Health}}: Turns into {{cd|Health}} entity tag for all bucketable entities.
*** {{nbt|int|Age}}: Turns into {{cd|Age}} entity tag for [[axolotl]]s and [[tadpole]]s.
*** {{nbt|long|HuntingCooldown}}: Turns into the expiry time of the memory module {{cd|has_hunting_cooldown}} for [[axolotl]]s.<!--
